contest-event.event-date:
June 6, 1884 D Bottom Mossley (Whit Friday)
Bottom Mossley (Whit Friday) 0 March Contest Whit Friday Tameside bottom-mossley-whit-friday
Contest ran 1884-1955.
Mossley "As a former member of Meltham & Meltham Mills Band I once heard from someone (who first was a member in 1930) that this contest was actually a draw . It all started from the previous year when two men were bragging about who had the best band from their church at the Whit Friday morning procession of witness , and a wager was set of One Guinea to decide who had the best band . The adjudicator couldn't split them and it was declared a tie ."
Oct. 15, 2015, 1:11 p.m. March 22, 2021, 8:05 a.m.
1 Meltham and Meltham Mills Band Unknown
2 Mossley Brow Unknown
